languages.text: "Спасибо, что вытащили меня из этой... тьмы, Лорд-капитан. И простите за произошедшее. Я... Давайте же скорее оставим сие проклятое место".

traits.locale_text: "Спасибо, что вытащиили меня из этой... тьмы, Лорд-капитан. И простите за произошедшее. Я... Давайте же скорее оставим сие проклятое место".

languages.text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо, что вытащили меня из этой... тьмы, Лорд-капитан. И простите за произошедшее. Я... Давайте же скорее оставим сие проклятое место".

"I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your apology for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."
"I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your apology for what happened. I, uh... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

"I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."
"I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

languages.text: 「あの…暗闇から助けてくれてありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。そして、どうか謝らせてください。私、その…そうだ、とにかくこの酷い場所から出ましょう」
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: 「あの…暗闇から助けてくれてありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。そして、どうか謝らせてください。私、その…そうだ、とにかくこの酷い場所から出ましょう」

languages.text: “谢谢你将我从……黑暗中解救出来，舰长大人。刚刚发生的事情，我祈求能得到你的原谅。我……噢，咱们还是赶紧离开这个可怕的地方吧。”
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你将我从……黑暗中解救出来，舰长大人。刚刚发生的事情，我祈求能得到你的原谅。我，呃……噢，咱们还是赶紧离开这个可怕的地方吧。”

languages.text: «Le agradezco que me haya sacado de esa... oscuridad, Lord Capitán. Y ruego su perdón por lo ocurrido. Yo... Oh, marchémonos antes este horrible lugar».
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: «Le agradezco que me haya sacado de esa... oscuridad, Lord Capitán. Y ruego su perdón por lo ocurrido. Yo... Oh, marchémonos antes este horrible lugar».

languages.text: "Danke, dass Ihr mich aus dieser ... Dunkelheit gezogen habt, Lord Captain. Und ich bitte um Vergebung für das, was geschehen ist. Ich ... Ach, verschwinden wir endlich aus dieser Hölle."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, dass Ihr mich aus dieser ... Dunkelheit gezogen habt, Lord Captain. Und ich bitte um Verzeihung für das, was geschehen ist. Ich, äh ... Ach, verschwinden wir endlich aus dieser Hölle."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie de m'avoir extirpée de ces... ténèbres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je vous demande humblement pardon pour ce qui s'est passé. Je... Oh, quittons donc ce lieu maudit sans tarder. »
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie de m'avoir extirpée de ces... ténèbres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et je vous demande humblement pardon pour ce qu'il s'est passé. Je... Oh, quittons donc ce lieu maudit sans tarder. »

languages.text: "Beni o karanlıktan kurtardığın için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan... Olan biten için de affını dilerim. Şey... Artık bu korkunç yerden gidelim."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for pulling me out of that... darkness, Lord Captain. And I beg your forgiveness for what happened. I... Oh, let us leave this awful place at last."

traits.locale_text: "Beni o karanlıktan kurtardığın için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan... Olan bitenler için de affını dilerim. Ah... Artık gidelim bu korkunç ortamdan."
